ygData.subject: Re: Items poliferation is a sword of damakle over Casters!
ygData.msgSnippet: Actualy if you visit a magic board on vault you will see that many 50 lv wizards say that items and resistance are two things wich create most problems with
ygData.messageBody:
Actualy if you visit a magic board on vault you will see that many 50 lv
wizards say that items and resistance are two things wich create most
problems with balance of clases. I have writen many articles about wizards
are nice class also and how to play and diferent tactics wich i use, this
maybe are not best or errorfree but are at last something wich people wich
start to get in problems can use. I cant talk about problems wich other
classes have as there are many worst classes then wizard but i try to get
attention to some problems wich i know best and wizard i play realy muchso
i know its problem more. I have been playing wizard from a beta and i know
a bit about mechanic under a game also. Im sorry that my poor english many
times require that my articles you have to read with attention as first
look it is not exactly what i wished to say.

Wizard dont suck as you say but they need some attention as they was very
god balanced class at start but as others get powered up and fine tuned
also wizard class need to get some changes.

First i will like for all clases to have less meditation time and healing
time as it is something wrong that i have to stay looking in same book 50%
of the game for me it is not funny and i dont think it is my time spent well !

Second every class have its strong and low levels ... wizards are low at
start (what is expected) and at end (what is not expected) but are strong
at middle lv. I wish to get lo high lv and be able to participate at dragon
hunt if you read some posts of 50 lv guys WIZARD cant do it now and this is
a BIG problem for me. Wich can be maybe resolved with items wich lower
resistence so we return to my first post.


After i played 5 classes until lv 10 - 27 i have some experience to say and
point to problems wich i have seen.


At 17.04 10/09/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
>Wizard wrote:
>>
>> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>>
>> Dear Vincent,
>>
>> I realy only can see that you are in bad mode maybe you can think a bit
>> before replying, and if you dont have to say anything useful take a break.
>> Only useful was that you say about your warrior at 3 lv but other things
>> are realy dont help any discusion and your tone is realy arogant.
>>
>
>Actually, I found Vincent's article to be interesting. He sure had a lot
>more insight and understanding of the game than you. All you ever post
>is how Wizards suck compared to other classes, and use out of whack
>examples (like the warrior hitting for 70). Sure, some complaints are
>justified, but you make it a regularity to reiterate the same things
>over and over at set intervals.
>
>I wouldn't be going this hard on you would you have not attacked Vincent
>for no apparent reason. But I do mean what I say. To use your own words,
>Vincent's post was a lot more "useful" than yours.
>
>--
>Sergey
